title: Shiloh National Military Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         Eastern National Bookstore NPS Photo  Eastern National, a cooperating association with the National Park Service, operates two book stores at Shiloh National Military Park - one at Shiloh Battlefield and the other at the Corinth Civil War Interpretive Center. It also administers a satellite store at the Tennessee River Museum in Savannah, Tennessee. These stores carry a wide variety of books, maps, DVDs, CDs, post cards, clothing, and other items relating to Shiloh National Military Park, the Civil War, the history of West Tennessee and Northern Mississippi, and other associated National Park areas.   If you need assistance or would like to place an order, you can contact Eastern National at Shiloh by calling 731-689-3475 or at Corinth by calling 662-287-9273. You may also visit their website at www.eparks.com. (Please note that many more items are available in store rather than through the website) Both the Shiloh and Corinth bookstores are open from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm everyday except during the winter season, when the Shiloh bookstore is open from 8:00 am - 4:30 pm. The bookstores are closed, along with all park facilities, on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day.       Â     Bookstore at Shiloh National Military Park NPS Photo
